faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Roozegaar Calendar

questions.question: What is Roozegaar Calendar?
questions.answer: Roozegaar Calendar is a bilingual (Persian & Gregorian) calendar application with event management capabilities. It allows you to view both calendar systems simultaneously and manage your events efficiently.

questions.question: Is the application free?
questions.answer: Yes, Roozegaar Calendar is completely free to use with no hidden costs or subscription fees.

questions.question: Do I need an internet connection to use the app?
questions.answer: No, the application works completely offline. All your data is stored locally on your device.

questions.question: Which browsers are supported?
questions.answer: The application works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and Opera.

questions.question: How do I add an event?
questions.answer: Press and hold on any date in the calendar for about half a second, then the event addition window will open. Enter the event title and description and save it.

questions.question: How do I switch between Persian and Gregorian calendars?
questions.answer: You can change the main calendar from the settings section. Go to Settings → Main Calendar and select your preferred calendar system.

questions.question: Can I see both calendars at the same time?
questions.answer: Yes, when the secondary calendar display is enabled, you can see both dates simultaneously for each day.

questions.question: How do I delete an event?
questions.answer: Click on the date containing the event, then in the events list, click the delete button next to the desired event.

questions.question: Can I export my events?
questions.answer: Currently, export feature is not available, but all your events are safely stored in your browser's local storage.

questions.question: I lost my events after updating the browser. What should I do?
questions.answer: Events are stored in your browser's local storage. If you clear browser data or use private browsing, events may be lost. We recommend regularly backing up important events.

questions.question: The calendar doesn't display correctly. What should I do?
questions.answer: Try refreshing the page (F5). If the problem persists, clear your browser cache and reload the application.

questions.question: Can I install the app on my phone?
questions.answer: Yes! Roozegaar Calendar is a PWA (Progressive Web App). You can install it on your phone by clicking the install button in your browser.

questions.question: Is my data synced between devices?
questions.answer: No, data is stored locally on each device. We're working on cloud sync feature for future versions.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, all your data remains on your device and is not sent to any servers. We respect your privacy completely.

questions.question: Do you collect personal information?
questions.answer: No, we do not collect any personal information. The application works entirely locally on your device.

questions.question: Can I use the app without creating an account?
questions.answer: Yes, no account or registration is required to use Roozegaar Calendar.
